channel.title: RStudio on A minimal personal website
channel.description: Recent content in RStudio on A minimal personal website

item.title: Tidyverse Dplyr Package
item.description: Introduction to dplyr Essential package Filter Arrange Mutate Filter_Arrange_Mutate Grouping and Summarising Summarising Grouping Visualizing medianGdpPercap within each continent within each year Data visualisation Essential package Scatter plot Faceting Line plot Bar plot Histogram Box plot Asthetics Introduction to dplyr Essential package library(dplyr) library(gapminder) # a built-in dataset called "gapminder" in R studio Filter Extracting a subset from observations, only containing the row of chosen variables.

item.title: Shortcuts in R studio
item.description: R shortcuts make the programming life easier. They are available directly in the Navigation Bar - Tools- Keyboard shortcuts help. I listed commonly used shortcuts that might help R beginners (students) like me: Table: Shortcuts make life easier Windows & Linux Mac Open Document Ctrl + O Cmd + O New R Script Ctrl + Shift + N Cmd + Shift + N Run Selected Line Ctrl + Shift + ↵ Cmd + Shift + ↵ Undo Ctrl + Z Cmd + Z Redo Ctrl + Shift + Z Cmd + Shift + Z Copy Ctrl + C Cmd + C Paste Ctrl + Y Cmd + Y Cut Ctrl + X Cmd + X Move Lines Up/Down Alt+Up/Down Option+Up/Down Delete Line Ctrl + D Cmd + D Move to Line start Ctrl + Left Cmd + Left Move to Line end Ctrl + Right Cmd + Right Select to Line Start Ctrl + Shift + Left Cmd + + Shift + Left Select to Line End Ctrl + Shift + Right Cmd + + Shift + Right Insert Pipe Operator( %>% ) Ctrl + Shift + M Cmd + Shift + M Find Ctrl + F Cmd + F
